testcase.classname: As a User, I want to Order the Oil
testcase.name: The user downloads the Brochure
testcase.system-out: When To lanch the URL of the application....................................passed And click the “About Us” button.............................................passed And scroll down and see the Download Brochure (English).....................passed Then check the Brochure is downloaded.......................................passed

testcase.name: The user purchases the “Harmony”

testcase.classname: As a User, I want to Order the Oil
